messageInput.placeholder: What can I do for you?
messageInput.placeholderWithRag:
What can I do for you? 
You may refer to RAG resources by using @.

hero.title: Labor Union Research
hero.subtitle: Power at Your Fingertips
hero.description: Meet Bulldozer, your powerful labor union research tool. Investigate companies, track violations, analyze news, and uncover everything workers need to know with comprehensive research reports.
hero.footnote: * Bulldozer - Clearing the way for worker justice through powerful research.

settings.title: Bulldozer Settings
settings.mcpConfigDescription: Bulldozer uses the standard JSON MCP config to create a new server.
settings.pasteConfigBelow: Paste your config below and click "Add" to add new servers.

general.title: General
general.maxPlanIterationsDescription: Set to 1 for single-step planning. Set to 2 or more to enable re-planning.
general.maxStepsOfPlan: Max steps of a research plan
general.maxStepsDescription: By default, each research plan has 3 steps.
general.maxSearchResultsDescription: By default, each search step has 3 results.

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.description: The Model Context Protocol boosts DeerFlow by integrating external tools for tasks like private domain searches, web browsing, food ordering, and more. Click here to

reportStyle.chooseDesc: Select the writing style for your research reports. Different styles are optimized for different audiences and purposes.
reportStyle.academicDesc: Formal, objective, and analytical with precise terminology
reportStyle.popularScienceDesc: Engaging and accessible for general audience
reportStyle.newsDesc: Factual, concise, and impartial journalistic style

footer.quote: Originated from Open Source, give back to Open Source.

welcome.description: Welcome to ðŸšœ Bulldozer, a powerful labor union research tool built on cutting-edge language models, helps you investigate companies, track violations, and uncover worker rights information.

conversationStarters: What are the latest labor violations at Amazon warehouses?
How do union membership rates compare across different industries?
What are the current minimum wage laws in different states?
What safety violations have been reported at construction companies?

deepThinkingTooltip.title: Deep Thinking Mode: {status}
deepThinkingTooltip.description: When enabled, Bulldozer will use reasoning model ({model}) to generate more thoughtful plans.

investigationTooltip.title: Investigation Mode: {status}
investigationTooltip.description: When enabled, Bulldozer will perform a quick search before planning. This is useful for researches related to ongoing events and news.

research.errorExecutingCode: Error when executing the above code
research.errorGeneratingPodcast: Error when generating podcast. Please try again.

messages.replayDescription: Bulldozer is now replaying the conversation...
messages.replayModeDescription: You're now in Bulldozer's replay mode. Click the "Play" button on the right to start.
messages.demoNotice: * This site is for demo purposes only. If you want to try your own question, please
messages.cloneLocally: to clone it locally and run it.

multiAgent.moveToPrevious: Move to the previous investigation step
multiAgent.moveToNext: Move to the next investigation step

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.description: See Bulldozer in action through replays.

cases.title: What are the labor violations at major retail chains?
cases.description: The research investigates wage theft, safety violations, and union-busting practices at major retail companies, providing comprehensive documentation for union organizing.

cases.title: How do union membership rates vary by industry?
cases.description: The research analyzes union density across different sectors, identifying trends and factors affecting worker organization.

cases.title: What are the latest OSHA violations in construction?
cases.description: The study examines recent safety violations in the construction industry, highlighting patterns and companies with poor safety records.

cases.title: How do gig economy companies treat their workers?
cases.description: The research investigates labor practices at companies like Uber, DoorDash, and Instacart, documenting worker exploitation and organizing efforts.

cases.title: What are the current minimum wage campaigns across states?
cases.description: The research tracks ongoing minimum wage campaigns, analyzing their progress and impact on worker organizing.

cases.title: How do companies respond to union organizing drives?
cases.description: The research documents anti-union tactics used by employers and successful counter-strategies employed by workers.

cases.title: What are the health and safety risks in manufacturing?
cases.description: The research examines workplace safety issues in manufacturing, identifying companies with poor safety records and successful safety campaigns.

cases.title: How do labor laws differ between states?
cases.description: The research compares labor protections across different states, identifying gaps and opportunities for stronger worker rights.

coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.description: Find out what makes Bulldozer effective.

features.name: Deep Company Investigation
features.description: Uncover labor violations, safety records, and anti-union activities with powerful search and data analysis tools. Get comprehensive reports on company practices.

features.name: Human-in-the-loop Research
features.description: Refine your investigation focus, adjust research priorities, and guide the research process through natural language interaction.

features.name: Labor Law Analysis
features.description: Analyze labor laws, track regulatory changes, and understand legal frameworks across different jurisdictions.

features.name: Union Organizing Support
features.description: Access tools for tracking organizing campaigns, documenting violations, and building cases for union drives.

features.name: Report Generation
features.description: Generate comprehensive reports and presentations perfect for union meetings, legal cases, and organizing campaigns.

multiAgent.title: Labor Union Research Architecture
multiAgent.description: Experience how Bulldozer's specialized agents work together to investigate companies and support union organizing campaigns.

joinCommunity.title: Get the Latest Bulldozer Intel
joinCommunity.description: Stay ahead with the latest news, jobs, and insights from the Bulldozer ecosystem. Discover opportunities and connect with the community.
